messages.subject: Bye for a couple of weeks.
messages.msgSnippet: I m off to my mom s house in the Bay Area for a couple of weeks. I m going to help her get her house ready to put on the market. My mom doesn t have a computer
messages.messageBody:
I'm off to my mom's house in the Bay Area for a couple of weeks.
I'm going to help her get her house ready to put on the market.
My mom doesn't have a computer so I won't be checking in until
our return home.
'See' you in a couple of weeks!

Meghan
